meanings.definition: Relating to or involving the imagination.
meanings.sent1: The children created an imaginal world in their game.
meanings.sent2: Her imaginal stories sparked creativity in the class.
meanings.sent3: The imaginal unicorn danced through the clouds.
meanings.sent4: His imaginal paintings brought dreams to life on canvas.
meanings.sent5: The imaginal castle shimmered with magical possibilities.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of an image or images.
meanings.sent1: The artist's imaginal style captured the essence of nature.
meanings.sent2: The book cover featured an imaginal representation of the main character.
meanings.sent3: The imaginal clouds in the painting seemed to move with the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her imaginal photography revealed hidden beauty in everyday scenes.
meanings.sent5: The imaginal colors blended seamlessly in the artwork.

meanings.sent1: The dragon in the story was an imaginal creature.
meanings.sent2: The imaginal world he created in his mind was vast and intricate.
meanings.sent3: She described an imaginal journey to a land of talking animals.
meanings.sent4: The imaginal characters in the book felt as real as the people around him.
meanings.sent5: His imaginal adventures took him to far-off galaxies and beyond.
